0011011001110111 0111111111100011 0 -> sum: 1011011001011010, cout: 0

0000000101001011 0010001101010100 1 -> sum: 0010010010100000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
